item.title: Publication identifiers are great!
item.description: Recently, I needed to generate a consistently formatted publication list from a rather unstructured input. The idea was to take the growing list of publications from the consortium in which I am employed, and create a script able to regenerate and restructure it with as little manual labour as possible, while producing metadata reusable in other contexts. It took me on a deeper than intended delve into identifiers, APIs, and regular expressions, but what came out of it was pretty satisfying.
